word_mean: 用经纬仪观测各三角形中的水平角，根据起算数据和三角学原理推算各点坐标的平面控制测量。
通过观测相联系三角形内各水平角，并利用已知起始边长、方位角和起始点坐标确定其他各三角点水平位置的测量技术和方法。

sentence.Network_en: Triangulation still constitutes the framework of most existing surveys.
sentence.Network_cn: 现有的绝大多数测量控制网仍由三角测量系组成.

sentence.Network_en: Usually for a precise survey control points are established by triangulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常对于精确的测量,控制点是根据三角网来定位的.

sentence.Network_en: We must invent an extension of the idea of triangulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须把三角法这个观念加以引伸.

means.word_mean: 1. a trigonometric method of determining the position of a fixed point from the angles to it from two fixed points a known distance apart; useful in navigation
2. a method of surveying; the area is divided into triangles and the length of one side and its angles with the other two are measured, then the lengths of the other sides can be calculated
